summary: The government wants the metaverse to be less about having fun and shopping and more about health care and industry.
title: China’s Metaverse Is All About Work
detailed_content: BEFORE COVID-19 SHUT down Guangzhou, authorities in the province in China’s subtropical south were preoccupied with another virus: dengue fever, a mosquito-borne disease that causes chills and muscle pains. The aedes mosquito that spreads the virus thrives in standing water, so officials in the central Tianhe district wanted to clear puddles from the roofs of buildings. But checking and monitoring all the rooftops—which mostly look like one another—was laborious and prone to error.
author: BY YALING JIANG
